name: Food Diary/食べ物日記
description:
Ever thought of what Yume Nikki would be like with Guy Fieri? No? Well I did.
Have fun exploring as the man himself in a silly and sometimes spooky dream.

Made for the June 2017 Yume Nikki Game Jam.

My primary focus was to get the cryptic nature of Yume Nikki down, so hopefully I didn't make it too hard to progress. I will give hints if anyone asks.
